title: Obchod trpasličího kováře
content:
Obchod trpasličího kováře v "Malém Mahakamu", nelidské čtvti ve Wyzimské Chrámové čtvrti, is run by Malcolm Stein, the blacksmith and his apprentice, the trader. They will serve only people who come recommended, and will not have their weapons be used against nelidé. How can you tell if he'll deal with you?

This is one of the only places you can get a bleskosvod made. Zbrojíř Řádu wouldn't know one if he tripped over it and was subsequently struck by lightning. You can also buy and sell goods here:

Zbraně
Zbroje
Brousky a runové kameny
Meteority

This should not be confused with the dům trpasličího kováře located just east of here. Despite the fact that the mouse-over text on the door does say "house" not "shop", narratively, it is the shop.

Úkoly
Noční hosté (z Kapitoly I)
Podezřelý: Vivaldi
Průzkum bojem
Strážce
Strašidelný dům
Personál
